name: My Family Tree Data File
summary: A FAMILYX file is a data file created by My Family Tree, a Windows genealogy program that organizes family tree information. It contains all family tree data, stories, images, audio, videos, and other attachments in the proprietary FAMILYX format, the primary format that My Family Tree uses to save family tree information.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: FAMILYX file open in Chronoplex Software My Family Tree 14
